title: "Whole Grain" help
content:
I thought this was myriad, but the storied “a” is wrong... any help would be appreciated. I’m having a “Duh-Oh” day today.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090627062514im_/http:/typophile.com/files/W_6238.jpg)

| --- | --- |

author: Scott Leyes

comments.content:
I think it might be [Frutiger](http://web.archive.org/web/20090627062514/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/frutiger/).

- Mike Yanega

Like i said... “Duh-OH!!”

Used to be my company’s face... I think I’ve blocked it out over the 20 years since.

Thanks.
